entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:09 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 12:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to periods of rain or light snow mixed with drizzle overnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Local blowing snow in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
